body:
Hi. I have an idea that i want to make a reality, but this idea needs supporters and help. Plus I don't want to waste my time developing it when nobody cares and boycotts it, so hear me out.

Idea:

A website. Adsense. Making money through adverts.

I've been seeing many people who are promoting cracked mc accounts,servers and such and want to end this.

I've realised many of this people are kids that can't afford it or just don't have the means to buy one. Because I WAS one of those kids.

So what i want to do, is to create a community in which by manipulating the traffic to a certain website by "enticing" them to go back and in return I will be able to buy a giftcard for them using the earned cash.

Thus, ending the reign of fake Minecraft accounts and such. 

I hope to expand this idea in the future for all different types of games and services.

Thank you for your time and I hope to receive your favourable response in due time. 

Please help me do this poll! Thank you! 

http://www.poll-maker.com/poll402750xBf7E46f3-15

Results: http://www.poll-maker.com/results402750x88C48765-15

Just testing out things (Website, Adsense already applied) : 
http://dominantaken.weebly.com/

And while we'r on the Avicus Site/Side, why not use this system to also help players on Avicus buy kits and packs, without having to spend a single cent? Why not?

title: A MC Account For Everyone. [Planned Project]

replies.body:

You seem like a nice guy for wanting to help but I highly doubt this is doable.

replies.body:
Hmmm. No offense, but this seems a little... naive... sorry. How are you gonna get everyone as in, millions of people across the whole planet premium accounts?

I mean, you definitely have my moral support as you seem like a cool person for doing this but the reality is simply impossible unless you're Bill Gates-tier rich. This would cost around... 200,000 or so dollars... Money you can use instead to buy a house, live your life or go have fun.

replies.body:
I don't accept donations, just visit the website and share the website. Thats the best way you can help for now. 

Next time I hope to make ad loopers with adfly and other such stuff like youtube videos.

But for now just check out the site.
Thanks for contributing.
